name: ROBOTICS
description:
#DAIANA%20LAZZARIN 
#daiana_lazzarin
@daiana_lazzarin
Title: "ROBOTICS"
Duration: 0:01:36
Direction, Production and Sound: Daiana Lucia Lazzarin (DLL)
Year: 2010
Genre: Video art.
Technique: Mix of Digital Photographs, 2D and 3D Animations, along with Digital Filming. Use of 3D Studio Max, Adobe Photoshop, Macromedia Flash, and Image Ready.
Province: Mendoza
Country: Argentina 
Synopsis: The reflection of myself that represents the archetype of "Robotics", as if it were a modern myth, speed, dynamism and confidence in technology, represent everything that we currently are, what we have become. We have evolved from the analog to the digital state, and our eyes are hardly used when resorting to photographic lenses. Inside our mind, there are all the possibilities, since we have turned it into a vehicle that we use when surfing the Internet; we move mentally in daydreams, to non-existent places.
The digital age brings us various benefits and satisfactions, but also challenges and challenges that we must solve.
I am Robotics, Electronics and Digital, Art has now arrived, a maximum point of completion; in which he has integrated all the perspectives, shapes and volumes, the fourth and the fifth dimension in a perfect combination.
